title: PBE Account inactive?
body:
When I try to Log-In with my account it says the account is currently inactive?
Summoner name: Charm
Log-In: Croisiar

replies.body:
If your account was from the old system (prior to 10/25/2013) then it was deactivated since we've moved to a new type of system that PBE accounts to live accounts. You should have received an email regarding this. 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more information on the new system. If you have any further questions, let me know.
